column4: does anyone think using ubuntu 32 bit on a 64 bit system it would mess up my intel onboard hd 3000 graphics since my processor is 64 bit?  What are the disadvantages of using ubuntu 64.. it says 32 is recommended
Although you can alternatively just select 64bit. Actually, it's recommended you do so to get the most of the power of  your hardwares.

Nah, those are for those... You know... Newbie types. A lot of people switching from windows and etc.    If this website offered you many options like that, without a RECOMMENDATION, a lot of people would either never use ubuntu or come here asking questions "is 32bit or 64bit better? which one?)
